𓏤 on 𒂊 𒉈 e-ne; 𒀀 𒉈 a-ne "he, she"

𓌡 𓏤 | be alone |

alone ⇔ solo ⇔ apart ⇔ getrennt entteilt entzwei twine ⇔ dual

𒁲𒇻 single, unique

𒂊𒁲𒉡 e-di-nu alone 单 dan1

𒂊𒁺 e-du alone, single, sole, to know
